name: Living Room Sofa
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="sofaFabricGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="cushionShine" cx="40%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="40%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.4);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="80" y="300" width="352" height="100" fill="url(#sofaFabricGrad)" rx="15" ry="15" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="50" height="100" fill="url(#sofaFabricGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="362" y="200" width="50" height="100" fill="url(#sofaFabricGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="150" y="220" width="212" height="80" fill="url(#sofaFabricGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 100 300 L 412 300 L 412 330 L 100 330 Z" fill="url(#cushionShine)" opacity="0.7" />
</svg>

name: Window with Curtains
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="windowGlassGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,220,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,180,220);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="curtainGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="100" width="312" height="312" fill="url(#windowGlassGrad)" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="10" />
  <path d="M 100 100 Q 150 200, 100 300 L 100 100 Z" fill="url(#curtainGrad)" opacity="0.8" />
  <path d="M 412 100 Q 362 200, 412 300 L 412 100 Z" fill="url(#curtainGrad)" opacity="0.8" />
  <path d="M 256 100 L 256 412" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>

name: Wooden Wall Shelf
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="shelfWoodGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="312" height="30" fill="url(#shelfWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="100" y="300" width="312" height="30" fill="url(#shelfWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 100 200 L 100 330" stroke="url(#shelfWoodGrad)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 412 200 L 412 330" stroke="url(#shelfWoodGrad)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Area Rug (Oval)
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="rugGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,220,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,170,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="400" rx="200" ry="80" fill="url(#rugGrad)" stroke="#9C9C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="400" rx="180" ry="60" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.5" />
</svg>

name: Wooden Interior Door
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="doorWoodGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,82,45);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,41,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="50" width="212" height="400" fill="url(#doorWoodGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="320" cy="256" r="15" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#9C7C2C" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Small Coffee Table
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="tableWoodGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="200" rx="150" ry="20" fill="url(#tableWoodGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="150" y="200" width="20" height="250" fill="url(#tableWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <rect x="342" y="200" width="20" height="250" fill="url(#tableWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" />
</svg>

name: Wall-Mounted Television
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="tvFrameGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(10,10,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="tvScreenGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="150" width="312" height="200" fill="url(#tvFrameGrad)" rx="20" ry="20" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="120" y="170" width="272" height="160" fill="url(#tvScreenGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" />
  <circle cx="380" cy="330" r="5" fill="#FF0000" />
</svg>

name: Decorative Potted Plant
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="plantPotGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,150,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,100,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="plantLeafGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,200,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 400 L 362 400 L 330 300 L 182 300 Z" fill="url(#plantPotGrad)" stroke="#9C5C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="300" rx="90" ry="20" fill="#6B2D18" />
  <path d="M 256 300 Q 200 200, 150 250" fill="url(#plantLeafGrad)" />
  <path d="M 256 300 Q 312 200, 362 250" fill="url(#plantLeafGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Wall Picture Frame
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="frameGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,220,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,170,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="imageGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,200,255);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,200);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="150" width="212" height="212" fill="url(#frameGrad)" stroke="#9C9C2C" stroke-width="10" />
  <rect x="165" y="165" width="182" height="182" fill="url(#imageGrad)" />
  <path d="M 256 150 L 256 100" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Floor Lamp
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="floorLampShadeGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="floorLampPoleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 180 150 L 332 150 L 360 250 L 152 250 Z" fill="url(#floorLampShadeGrad)" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="246" y="250" width="20" height="200" fill="url(#floorLampPoleGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="450" rx="80" ry="20" fill="url(#floorLampPoleGrad)" />
</svg>
